column20: Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
column21: Charged Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.
column22: Plunging Attack: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
column169: #Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.
column170: Press: Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.
column171: Hold: Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws. The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus. The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.
column254: Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.
column255: Drunken Mist: • Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE. • Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.
column352: Cat's Tail Secret Menu: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.
column353: Drunkards' Farce: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.
column354: A Lingering Flavor: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.
column355: Shaken, Not Purred: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.
column356: A—Another Round?: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column357: Wine Industry Slayer: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%
column358: Double Shot, On The Rocks: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column359: Cat's Tail Closing Time: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts: • Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%. • Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
